description.narrative: In year one, Chinansi establishes early childhood development (ECD) center in the Balaka district of Malawi. In order to ensure that children receive a sustainable source of food at the center, Chinansi trains CBCC committees in farming and irrigation, providing inputs to launch a community garden. With this grant, the development and learning capacity of young children attending the ECD center are improved by ensuring that they receive nutritious meals.,,In year two, Chinansi constructs and furnishes a second ECD center and provides training for center caregivers. They provide agricultural inputs to both ECD centers to increase farm production and improve children's nutrition. Finally, they prepare for a maize grinding mill income-generating project by constructing a building for the mill, connecting electricity to the building, and training the mill management committee in conflict and financial management.
